actionCalls.name: myRule_24_A1
actionCalls.label: Notify AR Exec/ SR AR Executive

value.stringValue: Invoice is in "Validate Invoice". Please take the necessary action.

Invoice information is as follows: Invoice Number: {!myVariable_current.Name} Project Name: {!myVariable_current.Project__c} Customer: {!myVariable_current.Customer__c} Invoice Date: {!myVariable_current.Invoice_Date__c} Invoice Status: {!myVariable_current.Status__c}
Invoice is in "Invoice Ready to be Sent to Client". Please take the necessary action.

Invoice information is as follows: Invoice Number: {!myVariable_current.Name} Project Name: {!myVariable_current.Project__c} Customer: {!myVariable_current.Customer__c} Invoice Date: {!myVariable_current.Invoice_Date__c} Invoice Status: {!myVariable_current.Status__c}

actionCalls.name: myRule_28_A1
actionCalls.label: Notify AR Exec/ SR AR Executive

value.stringValue: Invoice has been approved by {!myVariable_current.LastModifiedBy.FirstName} {!myVariable_current.LastModifiedBy.LastName}. Please take the necessary action.

Invoice information is as follows: Invoice Number: {!myVariable_current.Name} Project Name: {!myVariable_current.Project__c} Customer: {!myVariable_current.Customer__c} Invoice Date: {!myVariable_current.Invoice_Date__c} Invoice Status: {!myVariable_current.Status__c}

actionCalls.name: myRule_30_A1
actionCalls.label: Notify AR Exec/ SR AR Exec on Rejection

value.stringValue: Invoice has been Rejected by {!myVariable_current.LastModifiedBy.FirstName} {!myVariable_current.LastModifiedBy.LastName}. Please take the necessary action.

Invoice information is as follows: Invoice Number: {!myVariable_current.Name} Project Name: {!myVariable_current.Project__c} Customer: {!myVariable_current.Customer__c} Invoice Date: {!myVariable_current.Invoice_Date__c} Invoice Status: {!myVariable_current.Status__c}
Invoice is in "Review and Update Taxation". Please take the necessary action.

actionCalls.label: Notify to AP Executive/Sr. AP Executive
